content: More fun and interesting stories galore – from everyday inventions dreamt up by NASA, to boxing champs with more academic clout than you might give them credit for! Plus, super creative 3D advertising – whether it’s street art scenes you feel you could walk right into, or billboards that leap back out at you. Oh, and blaxploitation horror movie posters, for those who like their retro!
title: 5 Coolest Links of the Week
author: Karl Fabricius
